adIntroduce: Used to manage ad serving for each terminal
drawIntroduce: Create a new sweepstakes for mobile phone
registerIntroduce: View  statistics for invitations and configure invitation rules
bulkIntroduce: Provide online commodity sales function to buy goods in terminal
integralIntroduce: Manage the site, APP integral task and registered member points
mallIntroduce: The user manages the client integral to redeem the goods
paymentIntroduce: Access to Alipay, WeChat payment and third-party payment platform
